text: Anastasia Romanovna was the wife of Ivan the Terrible, the tsar of Russia from the 25th of August 1530 to the 28th of March 1584. She was the daughter of Roman Yurievich Zakharyin and was born in the year 1530 and died in the year 1560 at the age of 30.She also had a genetic disorder in her bloodline Category:1530 births Category:1560 deaths Category:Russian royalty
title: Anastasia Romanovna
